overview: Get ready to be taken on an incredible journey as you go up and down the California coast with these hot young couples in love. Riley & Richie when not at the beach they are in each others arms. Nikki & Van surf waves together than explore each other sensually. Rose & Tyler spend a relaxing day at the pier and an afternoon in bed. AJ & Giovanni cooking together-loving together.
tagline: Everybody remembers their first summer romance.
title: Summer Lovers
